import{MotionGlobalConfig}from'motion-utils';import{isWillChangeMotionValue}from'./is.mjs';function addValueToWillChange(visualElement,key){const willChange=visualElement.getValue("willChange");/**
     * It could be that a user has set willChange to a regular MotionValue,
     * in which case we can't add the value to it.
     */if(isWillChangeMotionValue(willChange)){return willChange.add(key);}else if(!willChange&&MotionGlobalConfig.WillChange){const newWillChange=new MotionGlobalConfig.WillChange("auto");visualElement.addValue("willChange",newWillChange);newWillChange.add(key);}}export{addValueToWillChange};
